name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】LET THIS RAIN SHAMAN SHINE YOUR DAY!! REAL NO FAKE 100%!! EHEK! #KoboKanaeru3D [8xF1xccpc98]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru performs a cover of 'Silhouette' on a virtual beach while playing the guitar.
Kobo celebrates her 3D debut and takes the viewers on a tour of her virtual island.
The school bell rings, and Kobo rushes to her classroom on a tricycle.
Kobo arrives in the classroom and introduces her next song, 'Oh! Asmara'.
